valueProps.text: Automates workflows to save time and reduce manual errors
Helps businesses stay compliant with tax regulations and avoid penalties
Enables firms to grow their client base by improving operational efficiency

facts.text: Tax Star provides an AI-powered corporate tax software.
facts.evidence: Tax Star provides an AI-powered corporate tax software designed specifically for businesses in the UAE.

facts.text: The platform simplifies corporate tax compliance, e-invoicing, and Zakat calculations.
facts.evidence: The platform simplifies corporate tax compliance, e-invoicing, and Zakat calculations for businesses in Saudi Arabia.

facts.text: Automates tax returns and financial statement production.
facts.evidence: AI-Powered Corporate Tax Software: Automates tax returns and financial statement production, enhancing accuracy and reducing manual workload.

facts.text: Facilitates timely and accurate tax return completion.
facts.evidence: Corporate Tax Calculator: Facilitates timely and accurate tax return completion, allowing users to focus on advisory services.

facts.text: Streamlines the production of financial statements.
facts.evidence: IFRS Financial Statements: Streamlines the production of financial statements, minimizing errors associated with traditional methods.

facts.text: Notifies users of upcoming document expirations.
facts.evidence: Doc Expiry Reminders: Notifies users of upcoming document expirations to avoid penalties.

facts.text: Ensures invoices are compliant with FTA regulations.
facts.evidence: E-Invoicing: Ensures invoices are compliant with FTA regulations and integrates seamlessly with corporate tax filing.

facts.text: Offers Zakat calculations tailored for businesses in KSA.
facts.evidence: Zakat Calculations: Tailored for businesses in KSA, aligning with overall compliance reporting.

facts.text: Includes features for tracking deadlines and client approvals.
facts.evidence: Practice Management Tools: Includes features for tracking deadlines, client approvals, and automating workflows to enhance operational efficiency.

facts.text: Target customers include accounting practice owners, tax advisors, and ERP resellers.
facts.evidence: Target Customers: Accounting practice owners, Tax advisors, ERP resellers.

facts.text: Use cases include corporate tax calculations and financial statement production.
facts.evidence: Use Cases: Corporate tax calculations, Internal and client approvals, Financial statement production, Practice management and deadline tracking.

facts.text: Offers a free trial for users.
facts.evidence: The website does not provide specific pricing details. However, it offers a free trial for users to explore the software's capabilities before committing to a purchase.

facts.text: Provides tutorials and webinars as educational resources.
facts.evidence: Tutorials and Webinars: Offers educational resources to help users maximize the software's potential.

facts.text: Provides support and FAQs for assistance.
facts.evidence: Support and FAQs: Provides assistance and answers to common questions regarding the software and its features.
